Module com.example.main
Package com.example.main

Class CustomerTotal

java.lang.Object
com.example.main.CustomerTotal
public class CustomerTotal
extends java.lang.Object
This class controls how many customers belong to a certain group.

    • populateList

      public static void populateList​(java.lang.String country)
      This will keep the customer totals up to date with the information gathered from the database. It will display the number of customers in a country.
      Parameters:
      country - This is the country to search for when finding the number of customers in this country.
